title: #278 - After Hours: Airports, Design Constraints, and Concepts
itunes:title: #278 - After Hours: Airports, Design Constraints, and Concepts
description:
This week David and Marina have a casual chat about airports; design constraints and creativity in different buildings like hospitals and airports; pitching concepts to clients; tv shows; and more!

This episode is supported by Brizo • Monograph • Miele • Graphisoft
